titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the temporary suspension of duty for certain DVD readers and writers.
A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the temporary suspension of duty for certain DVD readers and writers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of certain DVD camcorder readers and writers. Directs the U.S. Customs and Border Protection, upon proper request, to provide for the retroactive liquidation or reliquidation of such entries.
